front.title: Using the GOST R 34.10-94, GOST R 34.10-2001 and GOST R 34.11-94 algorithms with the Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure Certificate and CRL Profile.

abstract.t: This document supplements RFC 3279. It describes encoding formats, identifiers and parameter formats for the algorithms GOST R 34.10-94, GOST R 34.10-2001 and GOST R 34.11-94 for use in Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure (PKI).
